text: I'm not making this stuff up! https://www.bostonglobe.com/lifestyle/2015/02/04/northern-ave-bridge-closure-felt-businesses-residents/dHTR130wr4NUfe6AYNGHCK/story.html … It's like a parallel universe! https://www.bostonglobe.com/business/2015/07/01/fort-point-restaurants-wait-for-neighborhood-grow-around-them/Xl5cYabzERWCPrCLFkhNQO/story.html …
